Name: ViewUsers
Description: This permission gives access to view users for a location.

Name: UpdateUser
Description: This permission gives access to update a user to a location.

Name: DeleteUser
Description: This permission gives access to delete a user for a location.

Name: ViewLocations
Description: This permission gives access to view locations.

Name: UpdateLocation
Description: This permission gives access to update profile information for a location.

Name: ViewIntegrations
Description: This permission gives access to view the available 3rd party integrations for a location.

Name: UpdateIntegrations
Description: This permission gives access to enable/disable available 3rd party integrations for a location.

Name: ViewSysDefaults
Description: This permission gives access to view the available system defaults for a location.

Name: UpdateSysDefaults
Description: This permission gives access to update values for available system defaults for a location.

Name: ViewCreditApps
Description: This permission gives access to view credit applications for a location.

Name: UpdateCreditApps
Description: This permission gives access to update credit apps for a location. This permission also gives access to view PII data in a credit app.

Name: AssociateCreditApps
Description: This permission gives access to associate credit apps with deals/quotes.

Name: ViewProductsConfig
Description: This permission gives access to view the products configuration for a location.

Name: UpdateProductsConfig
Description: This permission gives access to update the products configuration for a location.

Name: ViewProductCostProductsConfig
Description: This permission gives access to view cost information on the product configuration screens.

Name: ViewLender
Description: This permission gives access to view lender information.

Name: UpdateLender
Description: This permission gives access to update the lender information.

Name: ViewDeal
Description: This permission gives access to view deal information.

Name: UpdateDeal
Description: This permission gives access to update deal information.

Name: DeleteDeal
Description: This permission gives access to delete a deal.

Name: DeadDeal
Description: This permission gives access to mark a deal dead.

Name: CloseDeal
Description: This permission gives access to mark a deal closed.

Name: ViewProductCostDeal
Description: This permission gives access to view product cost information in a deal.

Name: DMSPushDeal
Description: This permission gives access to push a deal to the DMS.

Name: ViewLead
Description: This permission gives access to view lead information.

Name: UpdateLead
Description: This permission gives access to update lead information.

Name: DeleteLead
Description: This permission gives access to delete a lead.

Name: ViewCustomer
Description: This permission gives access to view customer information.

Name: UpdateCustomer
Description: This permission gives access to update customer information.

Name: DeleteCustomer
Description: This permission gives access to delete a customer.

Name: ViewRoles
Description: This permission gives access to view roles for a location.

Name: UpdateRole
Description: This permission gives access to add/update a role for a location.

Name: ViewProductsRemittance
Description: This permission gives access to view product contracts available for remittance for a location.

Name: VoidProductsRemittance
Description: This permission gives access to void product contracts for a location.

Name: RemitProductsRemittance
Description: This permission gives access to remit product contracts for a location.

Name: ArchiveProductsRemittance
Description: This permission gives access to archive product contracts for a location.

Name: ViewQuote
Description: This permission gives access to view quote information.

Name: UpdateQuote
Description: This permission gives access to update quote information.

Name: DeleteQuote
Description: This permission gives access to delete a quote.

Name: ApproveQuote
Description: This permission gives access to approve a quote.

Name: ModifyQuoteTaxes
Description: This permission gives access to modify taxes on quotes.

Name: ViewQuoteCosts
Description: This permission gives access to view dealer costs on quotes. This includes costs for parts, accessories and labor.

Name: UpdateQuotePricing
Description: This permission gives access to update prices on quotes including the purchase price of the unit.

Name: ConvertQuote
Description: This permissions gives access to convert a quote to a deal.

Name: ConvertToDealOverride
Description: This permission allows a user to override any blockers such as incomplete checklist items when converting a quote to a deal.

Name: ViewTaxProfile
Description: This permission gives access to view tax profile information.

Name: UpdateTaxProfile
Description: This permission gives access to update tax profile information.

Name: DeleteTaxProfile
Description: This permission gives access to delete a tax profile.

Name: ViewOrgs
Description: This permission gives access to view org information.

Name: ImpersonateOrg
Description: This permission gives access to impersonate an org.

Name: UpdateOrg
Description: This permission gives access to update org information.

Name: DeleteOrg
Description: This permission gives access to delete an org.

Name: ViewUniqueUsers
Description: This permission gives access to view unique user information.

Name: UpdateUniqueUser
Description: This permission gives access to update unique user information.

Name: DeleteUniqueUser
Description: This permission gives access to delete an unique user.

Name: ViewFullPII
Description: This permission gives access to view PII information.

Name: ViewPartialPII
Description: This permission gives access to view partial PII information.

Name: PullPreQualifyReport
Description: This permission gives access to pulling a Pre-Qualify (soft inquiry) report on a lead/customer.

Name: ViewPreQualifyReport
Description: This permission gives access to viewing a previously pulled Pre-Qualify (soft inquiry) report on a lead/customer.

Name: PullCreditReport
Description: This permission gives access to pulling a credit report (hard inquiry) on a lead/customer.

Name: ViewCreditReport
Description: This permission gives access to viewing a previously pulled credit report (hard inquiry) on a lead/customer.

Name: ViewCreditScore
Description: This permission gives access to viewing the score only for a previously pulled credit report (hard or soft inquiry) on a lead/customer.

Name: ViewCreditDashboard
Description: This permission gives access to viewing the 700 Credit dashboard.

Name: ViewCreditReportList
Description: This permission gives access to viewing the Credit report listing.

Name: ViewDocs
Description: This permission gives access to view documents.

Name: DeleteDocs
Description: This permission gives access to delete documents.

Name: UploadDocs
Description: This permission gives access to upload docs.

Name: ViewOrgNotifications
Description: This permission gives access to view notifications configuration for a location.

Name: UpdateOrgNotifications
Description: This permission gives access to update notifications configuration for a location.

Name: ViewPaymentCalculator
Description: This permission gives access to view and use the Payment Calculator.

Name: ViewChecklist
Description: This permission gives access to view deal/quote checklist information.

Name: UpdateChecklist
Description: This permission gives access to update deal/quote checklist information.

Name: ViewOFAC
Description: This permission gives access to view OFAC information.

Name: PullOFAC
Description: This permission gives access to pull OFAC information.

Name: ViewRFR
Description: This permission gives access to view Red Flag Rules.

Name: PullRFR
Description: This permission gives access to pull Red Flag Rules.
